import React, { PureComponent } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import "../invoice/invoicenone.css"; class Productcreate extends PureComponent { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { type:' ', name:' ', sku:' ', unit:' ', hsn_code:' ', quantity:' ', selling_price:' ', description:' ', taxable:' ', intratax:' ', intertax:' ', active:false, } } changeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } taxchangeHandler = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value,active:!this.state.active}) } submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const data={ type:this.state.type, name:this.state.name, sku:this.state.sku, unit:this.state.unit, hsn_code:this.state.hsn_code, quantity:this.state.quantity, selling_price:this.state.selling_price, description:this.state.description, taxable:this.state.taxable, } const tax={ intratax:this.state.intratax, intertax:this.state.intertax } console.log(tax); /*axios.post("https://farzi-erp.herokuapp.com/inventory/product/?ordering=created_at",data) .then(res => { console.log(res); }) .catch(err => { console.log(err); })*/ } render() { return (

New Product

) } } export default Productcreate
